skills.name: Spider Queen
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} The rank of {{ai|Spider Form / Human Form|Elise}} affects the power of ''Spider Queen''.
[[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] Human Form: Whenever '''Elise's''' abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant ''Spiderling'', up to a cap.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Human Form:}} '''Elise''' gains one dormant ''Spiderling'' whenever she hits an enemy with an [[champion ability|ability]], storing up to {{pp|type = [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|20px|link=]] Human Form's Rank|2 to 5 for 4}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Spider Form:}} '''Elise's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|10 to 40 for 4|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|heal}} her for {{pp|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|4 to 10 for 4}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]].
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Elise gains one dormant Spiderling whenever she hits an enemy with an champion ability, storing up to − (based on level).
sbc Elise's basic attacks deal type = File:Spider Form.png Spider Form's Rank ‒ undefined as as and heal her for − (based on level) as On-hit effect.
skills.notes:
* ''Spider Form's'' effects do not apply to [[structure]]s.
* '''Elise''' will always begin the game and respawn with maximum available ''Spiderlings'' stored.
* '''Elise's''' [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|Human Form|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|Human Form]] ability casts can only store one ''Spiderling'' each.
* The ''Spiderlings'' have a [[Pets#Leash ranges|leash range]].
* ''Spider Form's'' basic attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the '''bonus''' damage does not).
** ''Spider Form's'' bonus damage can be {{tip|blocked}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Spider Form's'' interaction with {{tip|dodge}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* Applies {{tip|proc damage}} on the bonus magic damage on-hit in ''Spider Form''.
* The ''Spiderlings'' apply {{tip|area damage}}.

skills.name: Neurotoxin
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Elise}} fires a toxin at the target enemy that deals {{as|magic damage}} based on the {{as|target's '''current''' health}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' fires toxin at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} upon its arrival, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: sbc Elise fires toxin at the target enemy, dealing them as upon its arrival, capped against monster|monsters.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 160}} {{as|(+ 4% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health)|health}}|Max. Monster Total Damage|{{ap|115 to 355}}}}

effects.str:
• st: Magic Damage
  • as of target's current health)">as: Max. Monster Total Damage

skills.name: Venomous Bite
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Elise}} {{tip|dash|pounces}} at the target enemy and deals damage based on the {{as|target's '''missing''' health}}, applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects.
If there are active ''Spiderlings'' or ''Volatile Spiderlings'' nearby, they will pounce with '''Elise''' and attack the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' {{tip|dash|pounces}} at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}, and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.

If there are active {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} or {{ai|Volatile Spiderling|Elise|Volatile Spiderlings}} nearby, they will {{tip|dash}} alongside '''Elise''' towards ''Venomous Bite's'' target and reprioritize them.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Elise dash|pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing them as, capped against monster|monsters, and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
If there are active ai or ai nearby, they will dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''missing''' health)|health}}|Max. Monster Damage|{{ap|145 to 405}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Venomous Bite'' cannot be used to cross walls or impassable terrain.
** The target will be damaged regardless.
*** {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} can cross walls and terrain to reach ''Venomous Bite's'' target and will attack provided '''Elise''' stays within their [[Pets#Leash range|leash range]].
* There is a maximum range in which ''Spiderlings'' or ''Volatile Spiderlings'' can dash to the target.
* {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} will dash even if they are {{tip|crowd control|crowd controlled}}.
* '''Elise''' will not dash if the target is within basic attack range.
* ''Venomous Bite'' will still deal its damage but not apply on-hit effects if it is {{tip|blocked}} or {{tip|dodged}}. It cannot be missed while '''Elise''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
skills.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 80,85,90,95,100 as 80/85/90/95/100

effects.str:

  • as of target's missing health)">as: Max. Monster Damage
  • : undefined

st_slices: as of target's missing health)">as

skills.name: Volatile Spiderling
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Elise}} sends a ''Volatile Spiderling'' to the target location that explodes when it hits an enemy or times out.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' summons an {{tip|untargetable}} venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which crawls to the target location and navigates its path upon encountering terrain.
The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.

If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing {{tip|champion|champions}}. The spider gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} based on its proximity to its target.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Elise summons an untargetable venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which crawls to the target location and navigates its path upon encountering terrain.
The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing as to nearby enemies.
If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing champion|champions. The spider gains ms based on its proximity to its target.
skills.notes:
* If ''Volatile Spiderling'' dashes to a target due to {{ai|Venomous Bite|Elise}}, it will not expire before finishing its jump.
** It can still collide with enemies while dashing, but since this proximity check is repeated only every so often, it might phase through an enemy on its way without detecting the collision if dashing quickly enough.

effects.str:

skills.name: Skittering Frenzy
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ci|Elise}} and her ''Spiderlings'' gain permanent {{as|{{sti|as|'''bonus''' attack speed.}}}}
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' and her ''Spiderlings'' gain {{as|{{sti|as|'''bonus''' attack speed.}}}} for a short time.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Elise's''' {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' and her {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
''Skittering Frenzy'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Elise's''' [[basic attack]] timer.
'''Elise''' loses ''Skittering Frenzy'' immediately when she switches to [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|Human Form|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|Human Form]].
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Elise's ai gain as.
sbc Elise and her ai gain as for 3 seconds.
Skittering Frenzy basic attack reset|resets Elise's basic attack timer.
Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to File:Elise OriginalSquare.png Elise#Spider Form / Human Form.
skills.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 60,70,80,90,100 as 60/70/80/90/100
skills.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|10|Starts on cast}}' as '10' and riot's value '12,12,12,12,12' as '12'

skills.name: Cocoon
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Elise}} fires a web in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} the first enemy hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' fires a web in the target direction, {{tip|stun|stunning}} the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also {{tip|sight|revealed}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: sbc Elise fires a web in the target direction, stun|stunning the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also sight|revealed.
skills.notes:
* ''Cocoon'' will fire from wherever '''Elise''' was at the start of the cast time.
* ''Cocoon'' deals no damage and thus does '''not''' trigger {{tip|turret}} aggro, or effects such as {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} and {{ris|Sudden Impact}} activation.

skills.name: Rappel
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Elise}} and her ''Spiderlings'' {{tip|vanish}} into the air for a short time.

''Rappel'' can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target. {{sbc|Recast:}} '''Elise''' and her ''Spiderlings'' {{tip|blink|descend}} upon the target enemy, or their current position if there is no target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Elise''' and her {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} lift up into the air, {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} and becoming {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} for up to 2 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for the duration.
''Rappel'' can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Elise''' and her {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} instantly {{tip|blink|descend}} upon the target, or their current position if there is no target.

If cast directly on an enemy, '''Elise''' and her {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way, ''{{ais|Spider Queen|Elise}}'' bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
''Rappel's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Elise and her ai lift up into the air, vanish|vanishing and becoming lockout|unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting sight of the area for the duration.
Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.
sbc Elise and her ai instantly blink|descend upon the target, or their current position if there is no target.
If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her ai automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way, ais's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
Rappel's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
skills.notes:
* When '''Elise''' casts ''Rappel'', a circle outlines the area in which a target can be selected to descend upon.
** She cannot descend outside the bounds of this circle.
* The buff granted from casting directly on an enemy is not lost if '''Elise''' switches to ''Human Form''.
* ''Rappel'' can be cast on any targetable enemy unit ({{tip|champion|champions}}, {{tip|minion|minions}}, {{tip|monster|monsters}}, {{tip|ward|wards}}, {{tip|stealthed trap|traps}}, and [[jungle plants]]) '''except''' [[structures]].
* '''Elise''' will attempt to position behind her target if she descends closer than ''Rappel's'' max range.
* Without additional vision, '''Elise''' cannot ''Rappel'' to {{ui|Rift Herald}} from the other side of the {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit, but can ''Rappel'' to {{ui|Dragon}} by standing near the {{ui|Scryer's Bloom}} spawn locations. This is a result of {{tip|sight}} being granted in a smaller circle than the target range limit for descending and the {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} map having height variations. With sight of the target, both can be accessible with ''Rappel'' from behind the pits.
* '''Elise''' has a smaller range for [[ground-targeted|ground-targeting]]. '''Elise''' will walk into range and then perform ''Rappel'' if this ability is cast while targeting a location outside of this range.
* If '''Elise''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during ''Rappel'', she will descend back down immediately.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Elise''' is in ''Rappel'':
{{ct|attack=Descends onto the attack target.|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death}}
skills.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 50,50,50,50,50 as 50
skills.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|22|21|20|19|18}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '22/21/20/19/18' and riot's value '12,11.5,11,10.5,10' as '12/11.5/11/10.5/10'

skills.name: Spider Form / Human Form
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spider Queen's}} effects are increased.
{{sbc|Toggle:}} {{ci|Elise}} transforms into a menacing {{tip|melee|spider}}, reducing her {{sti|attack range}} in exchange for {{as|{{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, new abilities, and a ''Spiderling'' swarm that will attack her foes.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ais|Spider Queen|Elise}} bonuses are increased.

{{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Elise''' switches between her [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] and [[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']].

{{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] Spider Form:}} '''Elise''' transforms into a menacing spider, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|25 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{tip|melee}} basic attacks with 125 {{sti|range}}, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' unleashes all stored ''Spiderlings''.

{{sbc|[[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] Human Form:}} '''Elise''' transforms into her human form, gaining {{tip|ranged}} basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' stores all unleashed ''Spiderlings''.
'''Elise''' begins with one rank in ''Spider Form / Human Form'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc ais's bonuses are increased.
sbc Elise switches between her File:Elise OriginalSquare.png Elise#Spider Form / Human Form and File:Spider_Form.png Elise#Spider Form / Human Form.
sbc Elise transforms into a menacing spider, gaining ms, melee basic attacks with 125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, Elise unleashes all stored Spiderlings.
sbc Elise transforms into her human form, gaining ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, Elise stores all unleashed Spiderlings.
Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
skills.notes:
*Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* If ''Spider Form'' is cast during a {{tip|attack windup|basic attack windup}}, '''Elise''' will perform a ''Spider Form'' basic attack that benefits from the bonus damage and healing from {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise}}, but remain at ''Human Form'' basic attack range, despite not using a projectile. This basic attack is considered a melee attack and thus will not trigger {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}'s {{nie|Wind's Fury}} bolts.
** ''Spider Form'' and ''Human Form'' have separate cooldowns.
